name: email_domain_changed
desc: The team email domain has changed.
long_desc: My Slack API Start here App features Messages APIs Slack App Directory Authentication Keep in touch Community The team email domain has changed  				Compatibility:									RTM 													Events API 							  					Scopes:					team:read 				 The email_domain_changed event is sent to all connections for a team when the email domain settings for a team change. Most clients can ignore this event.
